sentences.english: The flood control headquarters has urged local governments to step up efforts to fight the floods.
sentences.chinese: 防洪抗旱總指揮部辦公室號召當地政府全力抗洪。

sentences.english: Almost every year, there are floods or waterlog in our country, and the PLA often fights the disasters.
sentences.chinese: 我國是個洪澇災害多發國家，軍隊參加抗洪搶險頻繁。

sentences.english: After 1998 flood, China's charity cause made further progress.
sentences.chinese: 九八抗洪以後，中國慈善事業獲得了進一步發展。

sentences.english: Overall victory has been achieved in combating floods and the disaster-relief work.
sentences.chinese: 抗洪救災取得全面勝利。

sentences.english: One emergency war against floods was kicked off again.
sentences.chinese: 一場緊張的抗洪搶險應急戰再次打開。

sentences.english: OK, let's get down to business. First, we'll discuss flood relief programs.
sentences.chinese: 我們談正經事吧，首先討論一下目前的抗洪救災問題。

sentences.english: He donated the painting 'Flowers' for flood relief efforts.
sentences.chinese: 爲抗洪救災捐贈《花卉》一幅。

definition: to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims
to provide relief during times of emergency and disaster (idiom)
water levels during the flood season
cadres and masses/party officials and ordinary people
Resist US, help North Korea (1950s slogan)
